work second leg of small-cluster in top of next cluster chain 3 single_crochet in same st as second leg repeat from * across turn row 4 29 repeat row 2 and 3 thirteen times round 30 working around entire outer edge chain 1 3 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in next cluster chain 5 across to corner 3 single_crochet in corner working along short side chain 5 single_crochet in edge of next single_crochet chain 5 across to corner 3 single_crochet in corner working along opposite side of foundation chain chain 5 single_crochet in next base of next cluster leg chain 5 across to corner 3 single_crochet in corner working along opposite short side chain 5 single_crochet in edge of next single_crochet chain 5 to end join with slip st in first single_crochet
